entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of wet flurries overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
